header.sloganSubhead: Reveal the full value of your property

main.geoenergisez: You want to enhance your real estate heritage, master his consumption in ensuring him a local supply for thermal comfort or support your customers in this process?
main.geoenergisez2: Whether you are a project developer or building owner, company or community, take advantage of the low-carbon energy of your basement: geo-energy.
main.headbandHook: Renewable, local and low-carbon energy for resilient buildings.
main.textLogiciel1: To boost your project and identify the most promising sites, Geosophy offers you its simulation software.
main.textLogiciel2: From a single address, it determines the available underground resources for each location, links them to the needs of the building and the possibility of drilling.It then calculates energy revenues, investment costs as well as the property valuation of geo-energy installations.
main.analyser: Do you want to analyze your property for free?
